1511940.name: Boom Shocketa: Rocket Storm
1511940.description:
See the trailer for a preview of what racing is like in Boom Shocketa, and play the external demo for free to give the rockets a spin.

The project is currently in an alpha state and has not yet entered its primary content creation phase. The free demo currently supports single-player or local multiplayer racing, ghost racing, and ghost watching.

Online racing, items/weapons, and many more levels are planned, along with a hangar, and online record/ghost sharing.

There are many other features planned, please keep an eye on the project as it's in active development.
1511940.supported_languages:
英语*
*具有完全音频支持的语言
